text: Jerónimo Carrión y Palacio (1804 - 5 May 1873) was President of Ecuador between 7 September 1865 and 6 November 1867. He also served as Vice President of Ecuador and led a brief rebellion in 1859. He was a member of the Ecuadorian Conservative Party. Carrión died on 5 May 1873 in Quito, Ecuador from pneumonia, aged 69. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1804 births Category:1873 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador
title: Jerónimo Carrión
